name: Fiction
description: Books that contain stories created from the imagination of the author, not based on real events.

name: Non-Fiction
description: Books that are based on factual information, including biographies, history, and self-help books.

name: Science Fiction
description: Books based on futuristic concepts such as advanced science, space exploration, time travel, and extraterrestrial life.

name: Fantasy
description: Books that contain magical elements, mythical creatures, and fantastical worlds beyond reality.

name: Mystery
description: Books that involve solving a crime, puzzle, or some form of mystery, often with suspenseful plots.

name: Romance
description: Books that focus on romantic relationships between characters, often with an emotionally satisfying ending.

name: Thriller
description: Books that are characterized by fast pacing, tension, and high stakes, often involving danger or espionage.

name: Biography
description: Books that detail the life of a person, written by another person or by the subject themselves.

name: Self-Help
description: Books designed to help readers improve aspects of their lives, such as mental well-being, financial success, or personal relationships.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Books that are set in a historical period, often blending real historical events with fictional characters and stories.
